schema_version.title: Schema Version
schema_version.comment: Do not submit, value is assigned by the server. The version of the JSON schema that the server uses to validate the object. Schema version indicates generation of schema used to save version to to enable upgrade steps to work. Individual schemas should set the default.

accession.title: Accession
accession.description: A unique identifier to be used to reference the object.
accession.comment: Only admins are allowed to set or update this value.

alternate_accessions.title: Alternate accessions
alternate_accessions.description: Accessions previously assigned to objects that have been merged with this object.

items.title: Alternate Accession
items.description: An accession previously assigned to an object that has been merged with this object.
items.comment: Only admins are allowed to set or update this value.

aliases.title: Lab aliases
aliases.description: Lab specific identifiers to reference an object.

items.title: Lab alias
items.description: A lab specific identifier to reference an object.
items.comment: Current convention is colon separated lab name and lab identifier. (e.g. john-doe:42).

date_created.title: Date created
date_created.comment: Do not submit, value is assigned by the server. The date the object is created.

submitted_by.title: Submitted by
submitted_by.comment: Do not submit, value is assigned by the server. The user that created the object.

lastmodified.title: Last modified
lastmodified.comment: list of modfication times and users that modified - do not submit!

date_modified.title: Date modified
date_modified.description: Do not submit, value is assigned by the server. The date the object is modified.

modified_by.title: Modified by
modified_by.description: Do not submit, value is assigned by the server. The user that modfied the object.

references.title: References
references.description: The publications that provide more information about the object.

items.title: Reference
items.description: A publication that provide smore information about the object.

lab.title: Lab
lab.comment: See lab.json for list of available identifiers.

award.title: Grant
award.comment: See award.json for list of available identifiers.

elasticsearch_mapping_index_type.title: Field mapping index type
elasticsearch_mapping_index_type.description: Defines one of three types of indexing available

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: Documents that provide additional information (not data file).

items.title: Document
items.description: A document that provides additional information (not data file).

href.comment: Internal webapp URL for document file

items.title: External identifier
items.description: A unique identifier from external resource.
items.comment: Enter as a database name:identifier eg. HGNC:PARK2

average_fragment_size.title: Average Fragment Size (bp)
average_fragment_size.description: Size of average fragment in base pairs after fragmentation step

fragment_size_range.title: Fragment size range
fragment_size_range.description: The measured size range of the purified nucleic acid, in bp.

fragmentation_method.title: Fragmentation method
fragmentation_method.description: A short description or reference of the nucleic acid fragmentation protocol used in library preparation, if applicable.

fragmentation_date.title: Fragmentation date
fragmentation_date.description: The date that the nucleic acid was fragmented - submitted as YYYY-MM-DD.

fragment_size_selection_method.title: Size selection method
fragment_size_selection_method.description: A short description or reference of the size selection protocol used in library preparation, if applicable.
